lead_paragraph: Russia has named a track and field team for the Rio Olympics which includes gold medallists Yelena Isinbayeva and Ivan Ukhov among 68 athletes who are hoping an IAAF ban on them competing will be lifted by sport's highest court later this month.

headline.print_headline: Russia Names Athletics Team Hoping Ban Will Be Lifted
headline.main: Russia Names Athletics Team Hoping Ban Will Be Lifted

snippet: Russia has named a track and field team for the Rio Olympics which includes gold medallists Yelena Isinbayeva and Ivan Ukhov among 68 athletes who are hoping an IAAF ban on them competing will be lifted by sport's highest court later this month....
